item.title: Free Top Level Domain Names 2020
item.description: Introduction I Was surprised and wasn’t sure is this a spam or not, Top Level domains for free? that’s Odd to be exact, But yeah, Freenom offers top level domains for no cost at all! and that’s weird. In this article, I’ll show you how you can get a Freenom top level domain for free and in the correct way. Follow this guide very carefully because anyone can f*ck it up in no time.
